item.title: After 2015 Fantastic Four Movie Star Kate Mara’s Recent Comments About An MCU Return, I Need Marvel To Bring Her Sue Storm Back
item.description: Kate Mara worked hard to bring the role of Sue Storm to life in Fantastic Four, and she has made it clear how she feels about returning to the role.
